title: Phase 3: Go-to-definition feature
description:
Implement workspace-wide go-to-definition for TCL procs, namespaces, and variables.

## Completed Tasks
1. Symbol Index - core data structure
2. AST Symbol Extraction - extract symbols from AST
3. Background Indexer - async workspace scanning
4. Scope Context Builder - TCL scope resolution
5. Definition Resolver - lookup logic
6. LSP Handler Integration - Neovim integration (gd keymap, :TclGoToDefinition)
7. Initialize Indexer on Startup - wire it together
8. Integration Test - end-to-end verification

## New Capabilities
- `gd` keymap jumps to definition in TCL/RVT files
- `:TclGoToDefinition` command
- `:TclIndexStatus` shows indexing progress
- Workspace-wide symbol lookup with background indexing

## Files Added
- lua/tcl-lsp/analyzer/index.lua
- lua/tcl-lsp/analyzer/extractor.lua
- lua/tcl-lsp/analyzer/indexer.lua
- lua/tcl-lsp/analyzer/definitions.lua
- lua/tcl-lsp/parser/scope.lua
- lua/tcl-lsp/features/definition.lua
- tests/lua/analyzer/*_spec.lua
- tests/lua/parser/scope_spec.lua
- tests/lua/features/definition_spec.lua
- tests/integration/definition_spec.lua
